Name: Magic Time
About the game: Magic Time is an adventure in the arcade genre with a magical setting. The Dark lands are invaded by evil undead after an ancient curse. You have to go out into a dangerous forest and find your way home. Along the way, you will encounter many obstacles, so be on the alert! Features: - Unique opponents. - Colorful locations. - Nice graphics.
